jconfig.h has been generated using the following command:

PATH=$PATH:${NDK_HOME}/toolchains/arm-linux-androideabi-4.4.3/prebuilt/darwin-x86/bin

CC=arm-linux-androideabi-gcc \
AR=arm-linux-androideabi-ar \
RANLIB=arm-linux-androideabi-ranlib \
LDFLAGS=-L${NDK_HOME}/platforms/android-9/arch-arm/usr/lib\ -nostdlib \
CPP=arm-linux-androideabi-cpp \
CPPFLAGS=-I${NDK_HOME}/platforms/android-9/arch-arm/usr/include \
./configure --host=arm-linux-androideabi --disable-shared --enable-static --enable-maxmem=1
